TopicTitle: Save get lost when back to VAB

Articles.Content:
Sometimes, when I'm using planes and I'm "returning to BAV" I can't launch it again, (pressing "Go" button doesn't work), I can't save my plane anymore, I can't load anyplane or any game save because all of them simply disappear. Even if I go back to the main menu I can't find my save. The only way I have is to completely restart the game so everything is back but the issue is back very soon (2 time while I took the pics below). For information I have an I7-12700K, RTX 3080, 16GB of ram. Maybe I have too many ships saved (10-15), idk.

Thanks !
